Constructor & Destructor Documentation

UserRightsMapInfo::UserRightsMapInfo (  uint32  mapID,
const UserUser *  user,
const MapRights &  mask = ~MapRights()
) 
 

Creates UserRightsMapInfo suitable for sending to a module with the supplied mapID.

(This is for use in packets created in the server).

Parameters:
mapID The mapid that this is about.
user The user with an updated user right cache.
mask Will be used to remove rights that are not interesting.

UserRightsMapInfo::UserRightsMapInfo (  const Packet *  packet,
int &  pos
) 
 

Creates UserRightsMapInfo and loads it from a packet.

For use in the module (or packets received there).

Creates empty info.

const MapRights &  mapRights
) 
 

Creates an UserRightsMapInfo with one set of rights on one map.

bool UserRightsMapInfo::itemAllowed (  const MapRights &  itemUR,
const IDPair_t &  itemID,
const IDTranslationTable &  transtable
)  const
 

Returns true if the item is allowed.

Parameters:
itemUR User rights needed to use the item.
itemID ItemID on the current map.
transtable Translation table to be used if the map is an overview map.
